entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
